title: Ecommerce Website
description: A responsive eCommerce site built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring product listings, a shopping cart, and a clean, user-friendly design.

title: PokemonExplorer
description: A React-based web app to browse and search Pokémon using the PokéAPI, featuring real-time search, detailed stats, and a responsive UI.

title: MusicWebsite
description: A stylish music-themed website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring artist sections, playlists, and interactive UI elements.
